website_summaries.verdict: A straightforward paw cleaner with flexible silicone bristles that cleans effectively without irritating sensitive paws.
pros: Silicone bristles reach between nails and paw pads for gentle, effective cleaning
cons: Getting the top off for cleaning can be difficult

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: We have an 80 lb German Shepherd and a 50 lb hound mix. They come in filthy! Our back yard is mostly dirt from them digging so when it rains their paws are so gross. This paw cleaner is easy to use and clean and does a great job on their dirty paws.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina/Matt

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use. Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I know it looks crazy, but this thing really works. I love it! Before, I would have to pick up my Aussie and put her in the sink to wash off her paws. Now, I just use this paw washer on the back porch and I don't have to pick her up. She is kind of scared of it, but she lets me do it. So helpful!!
customer_reviews.author: A Bur

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product! We live in an area where it rains and snows and we have a fenced-in yard so I want to be able to have our puppy run around outside as much as possible! But I was finding it so hard to clean her paws. And I can't stand dirt which is the hardest part about having a dog!! This product seriously changed all of that. I've posted pictures as proof-I do use a small amount of dog shampoo and fill the cup 2/3 full with water and after a few scrubs in the cup her feet come out clean and the towel barely has any dirt on it! Highly recommend ☺️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Invention
customer_reviews.text: With just a few in and out motions, a filthy paw is totally cleaned. Make sure to change the water for each paw if very dirty. Works well on a dog whose feet are very sensitive. Easy to rinse clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Easy!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had this during the winter months. I didn't really think it was going to work nor did I think my dog would let me use it on him. I was wrong! He ran into the woods/mud the other day, pulled this foot cleaner out...awesome! After I got my dog to let me use it on his first foot, he actually stood there and let me clean the other 3 feet without fighting me! Toweled his wet feet off and he was good to go! Super easy! My dog is 75 lbs and has big feet; no problem fitting his foot into it.
customer_reviews.author: jmc

customer_reviews.title: This thing really works!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 60 pound Vizsla who has a penchant for getting mud stuck in between his toe pads. This little cup really does work! He does not even object when we put his feet in it because I think it feels good to him. Gets all the mud out from between his toes in a snap. This is a clever device. I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: The product has worked good and for the price I'm not upset I purchased it. I probably should have gotten the smaller size as the one I got is much bigger than expected. I hate to say anything negative as I knew exactly what I bought but if I get another one it will have a closable lid so I can fill it up and through it in the car and/or just have it ready and not worry about spills.
customer_reviews.author: PaulF

customer_reviews.title: really like
customer_reviews.text: This works great to wash our dog's paws. Make sure that you have a towel right by. I am surprised at how much dirt we get off his paws. The only drawback is that it isn't easy to get the dirt out of the container.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Darrow

customer_reviews.title: Lid
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this product because the lid didn't screw in so when I took out his paw the lid came off and the water spilled all over the floor
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: It really works!!
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what it advertises! It’s rained so much lately that my backyard is nothing less than a swamp. I have a 130 lb presa canario puppy. She has to get her zoomies in back there or she’s hard to handle. lol. So easy to use!! It must feel pretty good to her because she tolerates the process well. I ask her to “give me your paw”, put it in, rotate it, and wow!! Love it when products actually work as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Way Too Big For My 🐕
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this wonderful product was way too big for my dog. I wish it came in a smaller size, or 2! I would definitely order if/when smaller versions are available. Unfortunately I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Night Owl

customer_reviews.title: Grandogs love them
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Grandogs. One in Chicago winters a King Charles Spaniel with long paws and and Aussie in New Jersey. Both parents are so happy with the gadget. Both dogs are compliant and clean up is much easier and very thorough.
customer_reviews.author: Michele G. Cavet

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This has been great at my house. Fill it with warm water and a little soap and the dogs actually accommodate me using it. I have a Shepard and a Lab. Good size for them.
customer_reviews.author: K. Strickland

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It works! I use it a lot! Just be aware that you will likely spill water on yourself while using it. I just place a towel on my lap prior to cleaning my fur-baby’s paws 😊
customer_reviews.author: Girl2019

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to use. Not easy to take apart. just rinse with warm water. but worth it when you have puppies that love running around outside.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrial

customer_reviews.title: Great way to clean muddy paws after a walk
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my doggy everytime we return from a walk. Cleans her paws very well. Then I just dry this off. It is pretty amazing how much dirt it gets off.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnne

customer_reviews.title: Good for cleaning
customer_reviews.text: This works great on my dog who chews her feet. I clean them twice a day and this has made it a lot easier
customer_reviews.author: bestoftimes

customer_reviews.title: A Must for Pacific NW Sheltie Paws!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Shetland Sheepdogs. Their paws didn't look too bad, but pulled out the dog paw wash. Three quick swishes per paw and the water was pretty dirty when I was done. Better in the paw wash than my carpet. Great tool, especially in the Pacific Northwest!
customer_reviews.author: Aultra Violet

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wish the bristles were a little stiff to help knock the mud off. Was just getting paw wet and then using my hand for the big stuff. I do love the product.
customer_reviews.author: David N

customer_reviews.title: Clever invention
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing, it really cleans dogs feet of dirt and salt.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyK4372

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, completely impressed! We have 2 goldendoodles who love romping in the mud and this has helped quite a bit in getting their feet clean before coming in the house. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Black

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We have two small dogs and this is perfect for cleaning their feet. I thought it might be too big for them, but it works great. It would be nice for a medium sized dog also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother in law and she LOVES it! They recently built so there is no sod/grass in their backyard...just lots of mud. This has been exactly what they needed for their pit bull to keep her paws (and their new floors) clean!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Troutman

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for cleaning your dogs dirty paws after being out in the yard during a rainy day.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Mayfield

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: My puppy is a digger and with our red dirt and white paws she still just sits and lets this massage her leg and it cleans at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: JT sell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This product is FANTASTIC it makes cleaning the dogs paw very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Messy
customer_reviews.text: Water gets everywhere. Would be better if there was a lid on it to keep the water from sloshing out
customer_reviews.author: r. candy

customer_reviews.title: Very long
customer_reviews.text: My friend had a shorter one and bragged it up. This one is much longer and I guess my dog is dirtier because it was dirty after 1 paw.
customer_reviews.author: P. Larose

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the investment!
customer_reviews.text: Game changer for muddy paws! So much easier and gets our dogs feet cleaner than simply wiping them off.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Easy, peasy!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and fast for muddy paws!! My dog doesn’t mind it at all. Much easier than carrying her to the laundry sink. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M. LOmbardo

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: My Golden Retriever paws go right in it. At times, the inside is hard to get out to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long?
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Easy to clean! This is a must have. ❤️ It!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Winters

customer_reviews.title: Need strength in hands to twist
customer_reviews.text: I do not have the strength to twist as I have pain in hands. Sorry
customer_reviews.author: Dolores A.Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: N/a
customer_reviews.text: Great, easier than dog wipes or a towel. Only thing I have found to actually work
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Need to dump water out after each paw if really dirty
customer_reviews.author: Sean McGarry

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This seems to work well. The water is so dirty after cleaning, so it's doing the job to pick up the dirt. My dog does not like it though, and I have to force her paw in there. It is soft enough that it will not harm your dog. It is difficult to remove the inside to clean it and then even more difficult to put it back in the cup.
customer_reviews.author: P Gee

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Very useful for my dog claws, my dog have a disease on both of her claw, and I used this to clean it every night. What I do is I put warm water salt and vinegar and I wash it on her claws. So far it's heal now already and I'm very thankful for it. It save my money in vet.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

product_meta.title: Petcabe Portable Dog Paw Cleaner Pet Cleaning Brush Cup Dog Foot Cleaner
feature_bullets: ✔️ NO MORE DIRTY PAWS - Do you like letting your dog play outside but hate when they bring the dirt in your house? The Paw Perfect Paw Washer solves the problem! Perfect for small and medium sized dogs!

✔️HOW TO USE - Stick pet's paws in the pet washer(one at a time), swish the water around or spin the container to engage the bristles, and then remove pet's paw.Dry the paw (if you like – this isn's always necessary) and move on to the next foot. Add a bit of gentle soap to the paw washer or simply use clean water.
✔️ EXTREMELY GENTLE ON YOUR PET'S PAWS - The extra soft silicone bristles won't hurt nor irritate your pup's paws.
✔️ CONVENIENT AND PRACTICAL - Small and lightweight so you can take anywhere, plus the handle strap makes it easy to hold while using. Very durable and high quality product.
✔ 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - We are confident you will love the Petcabe
